item.title: Keith
item.description: Click for full resolution Hi, my name is Keith. I’m a medium size granite from the coast a Norway. I was rescued by the BGPR on the 25th of June 2021. I’m very friendly to people and most other rocks but I don’t get along too well with pebbles. I’m an inside rock and I love sitting on the windowsill with a view of the outside, watching the sun go up and down, up and down, endlessly up and down as the universe evolves and I stay forever unchanged…
